content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court resolved a matrimonial property case and decided to dissolve the marriage awarding the flat to the applicant the court also ordered the applicant to pay compensation to the defendant the text discusses various aspects of the case including the statutory matrimonial property regime joint matrimonial property and obligations related to matrimonial property the applicant made several requests including the annulment of the marriage establishment of the childs age and division of matrimonial property the court will consider the division of property compensation credit obligation and costs of the proceedings the applicants application was successful and the marriage was annulled the court awarded the applicant the flat as personal property and ordered the payment of compensation the court also addressed the fulfillment of obligations towards a company and ordered the payment of costs to the applicant and a sum to the state budget
